user_accounts_audit.recommendation: Set PASS_MAX_DAYS to 60 or lower in /etc/login.defs.
Set INACTIVE to 30 or lower in /etc/login.defs.

user_accounts_audit.check: Ensure default group for the root account is GID 0
Ensure UMASK is 027 or more restrictive
user_accounts_audit.recommendation: Set UMASK to 027 or lower in /etc/profile and /etc/bash.bashrc.

user_accounts_audit.check: Ensure UMASK is 077 or more restrictive
user_accounts_audit.recommendation: Set UMASK to 077 or lower in /etc/profile and /etc/bash.bashrc.

user_accounts_audit.check: Ensure default user shell timeout is 600 seconds or less
user_accounts_audit.recommendation: Set TMOUT to 600 seconds or less in /etc/profile or /etc/bash.bashrc.

user_accounts_audit.check: Ensure nologin is not listed in /etc/shells
Ensure temporary accounts expiration time of 72 hours or less
user_accounts_audit.recommendation: Verify temporary accounts expire in 72 hours or less.

user_accounts_audit.check: Ensure emergency accounts are removed or disabled after 72 hours
user_accounts_audit.recommendation: Manually ensure emergency accounts do not exist beyond 72 hours.

user_accounts_audit.check: Ensure immediate change to a permanent password
user_accounts_audit.recommendation: Ensure temporary passwords are changed immediately to a permanent one.
Verify /etc/ssl/certs contains only DoD PKI-authorized certificates.
